content:
I just noticed this: http://www.besasoftware.com/products/besafhir
Did anyone test it? Is there any point in looking into it compared to using Grahame's projectfiles?
We will continue to work with your project Grahame (Vitaly, Husin and me), I was just curiuos about this Besa solution. :)
interesting. we should invite him to join us here
but it's considerably less functional than my code
I sent an email to besasoftware and invited them here.
